Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the board of a maze. The cell (0,0) is the top-left most cell.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Board.Neighbour

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell getCell(int x, int y)
      Returns cell (x,y) of the board.
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the board.
      Cell getHome()
      Returns the home cell of the board.
      Cell getNeighbour(Cell current, Board.Neighbour direction)
      Returns cell next to the given cell in the specified direction, or null if it doesn't exist.
      java.util.List<Cell> getSmileys()
      Returns a list of all smileys on the board.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the board.
      boolean isHome(Cell cell)
      Checks if specified cell is the home cell of this board.
      private void setCells(java.lang.String input)
      Reads a string representation of the board and generates an array of cells representation of that board.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts current board into a string using the character equivalent of Cell objects.
